Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22595270]Influenza A virus (A/Roma-ISS/2/08 H1N1):inhibition of viral  replication in MDCK cells(EC50=225±5.8 fM);Influenza A virus (A/Parma/24/09 H1N1):inhibition of viral  replication in MDCK cells(EC50=50±1.37 fM);Influenza A virus (A/Parma/05/06 H3N2):inhibition of viral  replication in MDCK cells(EC50=22.5±1.16 pM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide may bind with HA  and precent the attachment to target cells.

Literature.Title: Bovine lactoferrin-derived peptides as novel broad-spectrum inhibitors of influenza virus.
Literature.Author: Ammendolia MG, Agamennone M, Pietrantoni A, Lannutti F, Siciliano RA, De Giulio B, Amici C, Superti F.
